import React from 'react'; import './HomePage.css'; // Import the CSS file for HomePage styling import { FaUserPlus, FaClipboardList, FaUsers, FaListAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; // Import icons const HomePage = () => { return (

Welcome to the Mini-CRM Application

Here's how you can use the application:

Create Customer Button

To create a new user.

Create Order Button

Create an order based on a user. Collects total spend, number of visits, and last visited metrics.

Create Audience Button

To create a campaign based on an audience of customers with the following criteria:

  • Customers with total spends > INR 10,000
  • Customers with total spends > INR 10,000 AND max number of visits are 3
  • Customers not visited in the last 3 months

The user should be able to add multiple rules on different available fields and perform AND/OR operations between them. Before saving the audience, they should be able to click a button and check the audience size. Upon saving the audience, they should be taken to a screen with a list of past campaigns with the latest campaign on top.

Campaign List Button

For seeing data of all campaigns created till now with their details.

); }; export default HomePage;
